full_text:
U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
Federal Bureau of Prisons
Office Memorandum
150 Park Row
New York NY 10007
DATE: August 10, 2019
FROM: Electronics Technician
SUBJECT: Medical Emergency
Inmate Epstein, Registration #:76318-054
TO: Operations Lieutenant
On Saturday, August 10 2019 at approximately 0635 a.m., I responded to a medical emergency 9 South upon arrival Inmate (Epstein, J Registration # 76138-054) was on floor the of his cell unresponsive with CPR in progress by Correctional Lieutenant and PA assisted transporting (Epstein, J Registration # 76138-054) to Health Services Area.
c: file

U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
Federal Bureau of Prisons
Office Memorandum

DATE: August 10, 2019
FROM: Electronics Technician
SUBJECT: Medical Emergency
Inmate Epstein, Registration #:76318-054
TO: Operations Lieutenant

On Saturday, August 10 2019 at approximately 0635 a.m., I responded to a medical emergency 9 South upon arrival Inmate (Epstein, J Registration # 76138-054) was on floor the of his cell unresponsive with CPR in progress by Correctional Lieutenant and PA assisted transporting (Epstein, J Registration # 76138-054) to Health Services Area.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions and a 'COPY' stamp.
